b:if.cond: data:view.isSearch and data:view.search.label not in ["Blog","Artikel","Articles"] or data:view.isArchive or data:view.search.query
data:posts any (p => p.labels any (l => l.name in ["Blog","Artikel","Articles"]))

b:eval.expr: snippet(data:post.body, { length: 180, links: false, linebreaks: false })

b:if.cond: data:posts any (p => p.labels any (l => l.name in ["Blog","Artikel","Articles"]))
data:posts any (p => p.labels any (l => l.name in ["Blog","Artikel","Articles"]))

b:with.value: data:view.isMultipleItems or data:view.isSingleItem ? data:posts filter (p => p.labels none (l => l.name in ["Blog","Artikel","Articles"])) : data:posts

<Group description="Daftar Produk" selector=".post"> <Variable name="produk.background" description="Background" type="color" default="#fafbfd" value="#fafbfd"/> <Variable name="post.title.color" description="Warna Judul" type="color" default="#595959" value="#595959"/> <Variable name="harga.color" description="Warna Harga" type="color" default="#595959" value="#595959"/> </Group>
<Group description="Icon Media Sosial" selector=".socialicon-widget"> <Variable name="socialiconwidget.background" description="Background" type="color" default="#f4f5f7" value="#f4f5f7"/> <Variable name="socialiconwidget.color" description="Color" type="color" default="#444444" value="#444444"/> </Group>
<Group description="Footer" selector="#footer-container"> <Variable name="footer.background.color" description="Background" type="color" default="#222222" value="#222222"/> <Variable name="footer.color" description="Warna " type="color" default="#dddddd" value="#dddddd"/> <Variable name="footer.link.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#dddddd" value="#dddddd"/> <Variable name="footer.hover.color" description="Hover Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> </Group>
